column1: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together. - Marilyn Monroe
The best revenge is massive success. - Frank Sinatra

column2: smile because it happened. - Dr. Seuss

column3: want good things for them...but still move on without them. - Mandy Hale

column1: The hardest part isn't letting you go
column2: but rather learning to start over. - Anonymous

column1: Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable. - The Wizard of Oz
It's not the end of the world to be rejected or to have somebody not love you. - Taylor Swift
The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it. - Nicholas Sparks
The hottest love has the coldest end. - Socrates
I'm proud of my heart. It's been played
